mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOMS (ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, CAPACITY, OPEN_HOURS, CLOSE_HOURS, CREATED_AT, USE_YN, IMAGE_URL) VALUES ('ROOM' || LPAD(SEQ_ROOM_ID.NEXTVAL,3,'0'), #{room_name}, {#capacity}, '08:00', '18:00', TO_DATE(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'Y', #{image_url})
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, CAPACITY, OPEN_HOURS, CLOSE_HOURS, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATED_AT, USE_YN, IMAGE_URL FROM ROOMS ORDER BY ROOM_ID

SELECT ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, CAPACITY, OPEN_HOURS, CLOSE_HOURS, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(UPDATED_AT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDATED_AT, USE_YN, IMAGE_URL FROM ROOMS WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ROOM_ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE ROOMS
ROOM_NAME = #{room_name},
CAPACITY = #{capacity},
USE_YN = #{use_yn},
UPDATED_AT = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE ROOM_ID = #{room_id}
